metadata.title: HEC relieves Dr Zia Ul Qayyum as ED

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, May 21 (APP): Upon the recommendation of Performance Evaluation Committee, HEC Governing Body "Commission" has relieved Dr. Zia Ul-Qayyum from his position as Executive Director. In the interim, Dr. Mazhar Saeed, Adviser (Planning & Development) at HEC, has been assigned the charge of office of Executive Director, said a press release on Wednesday. The Commission has also directed that the recruitment process for a permanent Executive Director be initiated without delay.
